name: garrison-test
description: This is the assessement project for Garrison Junior frontend developer position where you will build a content and comment web app. Users will be able to post content to predefined categories, comment on their posts and other users' posts, and vote on posts and comments. Users will also be able to edit and delete posts and comments.

scripts.install-start: (cd api-server && yarn install && node server) & cd frontend/ && yarn install && yarn start
scripts.start: (cd api-server && node server) & cd frontend/ && yarn start
